actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: To amend the Vocational Education Act of 1963 to assure Federal support for vocational education ofr junior high school students.

summary.text: Requires State plans for Federal aid under the Vocational Education Act of 1963 to allocate funds as determined by the Commissioner of Education for vocational education for junior high school students.

titles.title: To amend the Vocational Education Act of 1963 to assure Federal support for vocational education ofr junior high school students.
